name: Cosmic Cyborg Passive T3
owner: Bounty Hunter Eddie or a Max Awakened Cyborg Eddie.
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Grant a random offensive effect to self for 2 turns and inflict Passive Disable on an enemy for 1 turn when the enemy heals
Grant Immunity to Sleep and Perfect Sleep to all allies
This Talisman's effects only activate when equipped to Bounty Hunter Eddie or a Max Awakened Cyborg Eddie.
